17424.name: Variant Switcher
17424.description:
The Variant Switcher plugin recursively changes component instances to a different variant based on the specified property.


If you have a lot of different components in your design system that share a same property (e.g., "theme"), you can use this plugin to switch them to the same property value (e.g., "theme=dark theme").


Usage

The Variant Switcher plugin has three input fields:

  • Property Name: the property you want to change
  • From Variant: (Optional) the current value you want to target (leave blank to select all instances with the selected property regardless of the current value)
  • To Variant: the new value you want to set the property

17066.name: G11N Utilities
17066.description:
G11N Utilities

This is a free, open source plugin that has simple utilities to simplify the process of making a global-ready design. It's currently really simple; more features TODO.


  • Want to contribute more features? Go here.
  • Found a bug? Report it here.


Features


Pseudo Translation

This feature helps you account for verbose languages without having to actually translate anything.
17066.release_notes:
- Created a simple UI to allow Designers to modify the default behavior of the Pseudo Translation feature

See detailed PR here:
https://github.com/AaronPresley/figma-g11n-utils/pull/3

15936.name: text2json
15936.description: Extract strings from your frames into a single JSON

17380.name: Similar text selector
17380.description:
Find and select similar text in your designs by font styles. Just choose a text, adapt filter to fit with your preferences, and click on the ‚ÄúSelect similar‚Äù button.


You can select text similarity by :

  • Same Size
  • Same Weight
  • Same Family


I hope this plugin will help you, as simple as it may be !

17290.name: Fast Slice
17290.description:
This plug-in is used by designers to quickly mark the size of the frames(groups) for developers.

  1. Create a slice layer with the same size and the same name in the frame (group).
  2. Prevent developers from selecting elements in the frame, getting the wrong icon size and element position.
  3. Add a red background to mark the size of the frame.

If you find problems or have any suggestions during use, it is recommended to enter the following link to contact me.

https://www.wjx.cn/vj/hmuWich.aspx

16846.name: Halve
16846.description: A quick way to resize layers in half. Especially useful after pasting a screenshot from a 2x display.

17199.name: The Write Flavour
17199.description:
Add flavour to your ipsum text with themes like Sport, Fashion, Hard Yakka, Mo Money, Super Luxe, Dining, Cruising and more. 


The paragraphs are compiled from a large collection of selected words and phrases related to each theme. I love Super Luxe and Mo Money myself. 


"...Russian billionaire's bachelor party, Jay Z's guest list skiing in Aspen super yachts private art collection. Upgrade lifestyle Rolls Royce that's B for billions, I'm a Saudi Prince international jetset gold cars in London..."


and Faarshion 

"...Rockin Forever 21 - just turned thirty. What do models eat anyway? Long live the queen - long live Kate Moss, Karl Lagerfeld‚Äôs cat Choupette after party Alexander McQueen. I‚Äôm Hugo‚Äôs boss Burberry trench just another Vogue fashion night out, it‚Äôs Prada daahling..."


Want more flavours? Let me know what you want and I'll add them.


Put a smile on your work and a grin on your client's face. 


Note: This is still in Beta. It works nicely, but the sentence compilation still needs a few tweaks.

17234.name: Bomberos Tracker
17234.description:
Bomberos tracker is a plugin made for managing the activities on the Bomberos Planner community file.


Select a summary card and hit calculate.

17207.name: figmage
17207.description:
Upload Figma Items as Images across the web.


Figmage is for people who use Figma to generate assets.


It reduces export fatigue :)


Traditionally you'd have to export an image, and reupload to your server. Even a small typo or color change means you have to upload a new image to your server again.


Now you can just get click a Figmage frame, get a single url to an image, and never worry about exporting. Just the image url across your websites.


Make tweaks and push changes, and Figmage updates everywhere.


[Example]


Uses

Use it wherever you send images. You can update a frame and push changes without sending new links.


  • Blog Posts
  • Social Media Covers
  • Link Previews
  • Slide Shows


Pricing

Try it for free for your first 10 images!


More details on https://figmage.com

17389.name: Print Resizer
17389.description:
This plugin collects all components from frames in the current figma page and then copies and rearranges them into new printable frames. The printable frames can then be exported and printed on regular letter head. This plugin is especially helpful for frames with auto-layout since they can only scale in only one direction, making printing difficult.


Visit github for more information on how to use the plugin, how to report issues, and how to suggest further improvements.

17522.name: Screen Name Export
17522.description:
Export selected frame name and link URL to another page in the current file.

More detail is here.

  • Get your file URL from share button.
  • Select frames you want to export the name to.
  • Execute this plugin and past your file URL.
  • You will have a new page named "Screen Name ${DateTime}".
17522.release_notes:
- Let user enter file URL instead of file key for easiness to use.
- Show toast message after the execution.
- Restore file URL from client storage for 30 minutes.

17351.name: Print on Demand Automator
17351.description: Do you find yourself spending hours doing repetitive steps just to create print on demand designs? If so, this Figma plugin can give your precious time back. Create a design template with variables. Submit a CSV file. The plugin will replace the variables with the text supplied by your CSV file.
